As I have a kenbu presentation on this very day, I'm
not sure if I'll be able to attend the chat, since I'm
not sure if I'll be home at that time, but I will try
to show up, at least later on. Either way, I hope that
the chat will be fun, as always :) 

And definitely, after reading momoiro-usagi's comments
to Tama, I am certain that reading Japanese in romaji
is very different from reading Japanese in Japanese
(now, tell me some news :P)

Nja,

Serizawa Kamo
